docs.text: SnowMass Connect Documentation SnowMass Connect serves as a portal, which provides hosted job submission services for distributed, high-throughput computing. For portal access, visit https://snowmass21.ci-connect.net . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: SnowMass Connect Documentation
